```{r}
# Load Packages
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytuesdayR)
library(pixarfilms)
```

```{r}
# Load Data
pixar_films <- pixarfilms::pixar_films |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    dplyr::across(
      c("number", "run_time"),
      as.integer
    )
  )
public_response <- pixarfilms::public_response |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    dplyr::across(
      c("rotten_tomatoes", "metacritic", "critics_choice"),
      as.integer
    )
  )
```

```{r}
# Data Wrangling
pixar_films_working <- pixar_films %>% select(-number)

pixar_films_combined <- left_join(pixar_films_working, public_response, by = "film")

# Explore relationship between runtime and G vs PG and public reception scores
```
